name: Kevin Wagers
text: Great pizza. Terrible person working the counter. We called in the order 15 minutes before we arrive. They had not even started our order. There was no one in front of us either. On the phone the lady was rude, and when I paid for our pizza she was rude. The lady cooking in the back was nice and apologized.

name: Taff Rivers Jr.
text: I soooo miss this in New Orleans. My favorite Pizza. Great service, the lady that made my pie is awesome.....

name: Bob Brush
text: I really like Godfather's pizza and would have liked to order one if they would have ever picked up the phone. Tried calling multiple times...I guess they don't need the business because I'm not the only one with this problem. I'll just go elsewhere and order from their competition.

name: Melissa Thee
text: Such a delicious sausage flavor that permeates the entire pizza!  Supreme pizza and their TACO pizzaâ€™s are their best!!!

name: Dad Of Boi!
text: Awesome pie and friendly staff. Great place to get a quick dinner.

text: I just dont like it

text: Haven't had it very many times

name: Deb Boda
text: Stuart is the man! He makes the best pizzas ever!

text:
Man, what a nice experience.
Good to have a God Fathers back on town. Great tasting and perfectly prepared too!
